metadata.title: CVE-2023-22797 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An open redirect vulnerability is fixed in Rails 7.0.4.1 with the newprotection against open redirects from calling redirect_to with untrusteduser input. In prior versions the developer was fully responsible for onlyproviding trusted input. However the check introduced could allow anattacker to bypass with a carefully crafted URL resulting in an openredirect vulnerability.

criterions.comment: rails package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
